mapper.select:
select count(*) from smbms.smbms_user u,smbms.smbms_role r where u.userRole = r.id
and u.userName like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and u.userRole like CONCAT('%',#{userRole},'%')

select u.*,r.roleName as userRoleName from smbms.smbms_user u,smbms.smbms_role r where u.userRole = r.id
and u.userName like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and u.userRole like concat('%',#{userRole},'%')
order by u.creationDate DESC limit #{currentPageNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into smbms.smbms_user(id, userCode, userName, userPassword, gender, birthday, phone, address, userRole, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate) values(#{id},#{userCode},#{userName},#{userPassword},#{gender},#{birthday},#{phone},#{address},#{userRole},#{createdBy},#{creationDate},#{modifyBy},#{modifyDate})
